alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 2:36PM CDT until July 02 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Dale County in southeastern Alabama... West central Henry County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 236 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Ozark, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ozark, Midland City, Bells Crossroads, Skipperville, Echo, Bagwells Crossroads, Roberts Crossroads, Mabson, Snells Crossroads, Ewell, Barefield Crossroads, Beamon, Browns Crossroads, Dale County Lake, Goldberg Field, Blackwell Field A/p, Ward Bridge, Bertha and Dill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
